author: ebrondol
body:
The introduction of the Stacks is in first place made adding a new TkDDDStructure which is called either Phase2OTBarrelStack or Phase2OTEndcapStack. This contains the list of the Stack Modules (trackerStructureTopology.xml).
The new TkDDDStructure is recognized into the trk geom introducing a new GDEnumType called OTPhase2Stack (CmsTrackerStringToEnum.cc).
The CmsDetConstruction class has been modified in such a way that it can recognize when the module is a stack and configured to search for possible children: for Lower and Upper modules in a stack are fixed, following the same convention used for glued modules (+1, +2).
Finally, the README has been updated in order to include the description of the Stacks DetIds.
title: Introducing Stacks in CMSSW geometry
